name: Méwilo
summary: As a paranormal psychologist, you have been summoned to Saint-Pierre, Martinique to investigate a haunted plantation on May 7, 1902—the day before the catastrophic eruption of Mount Pelée. To solve the mystery, you must explore the history of Martinique and confront the legacy of French colonialism, how slavery and rebellion shaped the island.

name: Mémoire d'Arumac
summary: Aidez Mia à suivre les traces de son grand père en retrouvant le trésor perdu ! Explorez, résolvez les énigmes et collectez d’anciens artefacts.

name: Mémoire 0079
summary: Mémoire 0079 is a narrative adventure game about exploring a wiki-like interface to uncover the secret history of a mecha war between earth and space in the uncomfortably not-so-distant future.

name: Méandres
summary: Méandres proposes an incursion through the connections of white matter in a virtual reality experience. We move through this mysterious and labyrinthine universe of fibre bundles that encompass us like a forest to explore, but this fragile environment will be affected by our presence and behaviour.

name: Méli-Mélo: L'odyssée de la crème de marrons
summary: Bigflo, Oli, and McFly & Carlito must find a mysterious jar of chestnut cream in a crazy 2D platform game! Switch heroes at each level, face mini-bosses, and embark on a speedrun!
